list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a colored substance which is spread over a surface and dries to leave a thin decorative or protective coating.
the rectangular area marked near the basket at each end of the court; the foul lane.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the two players jostled in the paint
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hai người chơi đã đẩy lửng trong sơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cover the surface of (something) with paint, as decoration or protection.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the ceiling was painted dark gray
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trần nhà được sơn màu xám đen

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: depict (someone or something) or produce (a picture) with paint.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I painted a woman sitting next to a table lamp
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi vẽ một người phụ nữ ngồi cạnh đèn bàn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: display a mark representing (an aircraft or vehicle) on a radar screen.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: flying behind hills lessens the enemy's ability to paint you with radar
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bay phía sau những ngọn đồi làm giảm khả năng vẽ bạn bằng radar của kẻ thù
